content.description: Robinhood introduces a new blockchain and expands its crypto offerings in the EU and US with perpetual futures and staking services.
Fed chair Jerome Powell said he will not rule out intereta rate cuts in the near future
Platinum just had its largest monthly increase in almost four decades.

outlook: Markets are showing signs of renewed volatility and opportunity. Robinhood’s expansion into blockchain and derivatives signals continued fintech innovation. Meanwhile, the Fed hints at possible rate cuts, and commodities like platinum are surging—pointing to shifting investor sentiment.
